conclusion: Remainder inadmissible;No violation of Art. 14+8;Pecuniary and non-pecuniary damage - award
judges: András Sajó;Françoise Tulkens;Guido Raimondi;Kristina Pardalos;Nona Tsotsoria
scl: Camp and Bourimi v. the Netherlands, no. 28369/95, § 34, ECHR 2000-X;Hoffmann v. Austria, 23 June 1993, Series A no. 255-C;Hokkanen v. Finland, 23 September 1994, § 55, Series A no. 299-A;Ismailova v. Russia, no. 37614/02, § 49, 29 November 2007;Kutzner v. Germany, no. 46544/99, § 65, ECHR 2002-I;Palau-Martinez v. France, no. 64927/01, ECHR 2003-XII
